<リージョン通行設定255:4>

parameters:
Lex became king and implemented radical reforms within the
royal palace. The Senate, which had a deteriorating
relationship with Queen Caron, immediately held discussions
with the Terios Church to work towards improving their
relationship.

The people welcomed the young king who took up the sword and
sat on the throne. They praised Lex as the hero king,
likening him to the founding king, and insulted Queen Caron,
who had stolen the throne, as a poisonous woman and a
prostitute.

Once Lex establishes a solid support base within the
country, he begins preparing for a new action. It is the
great achievement that his father could not accomplish, the
conquest of the neighboring country, Tarasa.

The fierce young king, disregarding the advice of his
subordinates and the Senate, initiated a war. It had only
been about three years since he became king, so it was
premature to start a war.

The war, which began with insufficient preparation in all
aspects, initially saw the imperial side, which was superior
in strength, gaining the advantage. However, by the time
they landed in Tarasa, the imperial army was completely
exhausted.

The genius of war, Atu, was absent from the imperial army,
and there was no one who could replace him in a short period
of time. With the landing in Tarasa, the progress of the
imperial army came to a complete halt.

The expulsion of General Atu was not only a loss of a
strategic piece, but it also greatly lowered the morale of
the soldiers on the battlefield. King Lex would come to
realize the greatness of the Empire's eldest brother once
again.

However, we cannot stop our progress. Lex strongly requested
the mobilization of the Senate and the nobles. Eventually,
it turned into orders and commands.

Due to the opposition from the Senate and the nobles, Lex
ended up making enemies both domestically and
internationally. There was no time for him to rest, and the
figure of the young hero was no longer there.

The hero king who sat on the throne of the empire has
disappeared. In his place, a dragon wearing a crown, plagued
by suspicion and paranoia, now sits on the throne.

Priestess Sophia: Why are you dressed in armor? Are you
really going to the battlefield!?

King Lex: On that day, I wore this when I reclaimed the
throne. I must personally go to the battlefield and boost
the morale of the soldiers.

Priestess Sophia: With all due respect, I believe we are not
at such a stage anymore.

Priestess Sophia: I receive messages from the Senate and the
nobles, asking for my advice. They say that if any more
imperial blood is shed, conquering Tarasa will be
impossible.

Priestess Sophia: I understand that it is a difficult
decision, but the top priority is the stability of the
empire. Shouldn't we consider a retreat here...?

Priestess Sophia: I understand that it may be impolite, but
as a loyal priestess, please make the decision!

King Lex: You are the only person who speaks their mind
without hesitation, Sophia. Your advice has led to the
resolution of many issues within the empire.
Priestess Sophia: ...It's a waste, your words.

King Lex: I have no choice but to listen to your advice, not
as the king of the empire, but as Lex.
Priestess Sophia: Lord Lex... I-I apologize, King Lex!

King Lex: Hahaha, we're not formal with each other, right?
Just like usual, it's fine to call me Lex and you Sophia in
this place.
Priestess Sophia: Yes, Lord Lex... Thank you very much.

King Lex: Those who have come to consult with you should
include members of the Senate, nobles, and likely even
prominent merchants.
King Lex: Was Senator Pido among them?

Priestess Sophia: Yes, I have been emphasizing the
importance of the food issue. If war and crop failure
coincide, there is a possibility of famine and starvation
within the country.

Priestess Sophia: I have taken the liberty of holding a
letter, including his, so I am aware of the general outline.
Please proceed with your story--

King Lex: I see, is that so? Do you find it more comfortable
being with [that man] than with me?!

King Lex: You filthy whore... You're just like Caron, a
prostitute who deceives the nation.

King Lex: I thought something was strange! You were
colluding with the Senate and the nobles to hinder my war,
weren't you?!

King Lex: You're nothing but a former torturer! Hahaha,
tired of playing priestess, now you're switching to being a
whore!

King Lex: If you have an explanation, then answer me! Come
on, answer me with words that will convince me!

Priestess Sophia: I am a deeply sinful person... I have
accumulated sins as both Alicia and Sophia...

Priestess Sophia: I won't ask you to believe in me, but
please allow me to pray as an individual, not as a
priestess...

Priestess Sophia: I am neither an empress nor someone who
sits on the throne...

Priestess Sophia: Lord Lex, I will continue to pray for your
fortune.

Priestess Sophia: In the midst of my dark life... the time I
spent with you was dazzling and beautiful.
Priestess Sophia: Thank you... my... beloved...

King Lex: Someone come, hurry up! Bring someone who can heal
immediately!

King Lex's Royal Guard: What is this...!? We must heal Lady
Sophia's wounds, hurry!

King Lex's Royal Guard: Inform the palace that there are
thieves! Now, King Lex, let's go to a safe place--

King Lex's Royal Guard: King Lex, the blood on that sword...
could it be...

King Lex: There is a nobleman from the Senate who made me
draw my sword, Pido. Detain him immediately.

King Lex's Royal Guard: U-Understood! I will send a
messenger to the campus on a fast horse...!
King Lex: I will definitely take revenge.

After stabbing Sophia, Lex became the embodiment of the Mad
King. Prior to that, he had a consistent cause of conquering
Tarasa, even though there were reckless orders, and there
were many supporters.

However, after this night, the only thing that was
consistently carried out was purges. From the Senate,
nobles, merchants, soldiers, to the citizens, there were no
exceptions. The entire empire trembled in fear at the
appearance of the third [Dragon].

Lex, who had maintained neutrality, eventually targeted the
Terios Church, the Magic Academy, and even the Adventurer's
Guild for attack.

The Senate has decided to subdue the Mad King Lex. They
formally requested the Adventurer's Guild, Ftera, and Agonia
accepted the request. Clea and the others will once again
fight to reclaim the throne.

However, unlike the previous recapture of the throne, the
battlefield now covers the entire empire. It is difficult to
overturn the overwhelming difference in military strength,
and while losing members, they were forced to flee to the
Mucos region.

After that, Agonia boldly moved to Tarasa. They confirmed
that their interests aligned in the subjugation of Lex and
temporarily joined forces in order to bring an early end to
the war.

The Adventurer's Guild, Ftera, is a symbol of freedom.
Agonia couldn't let that be broken.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置
マップが見つからないため雰囲気が近いマップで仮置き
